column3: School of Engineering and Applied Sciences
column5: Chemical Engineering Course OverviewThe MSc in Chemical Engineering provides an advanced and systematic understanding of the field, equipping you with the required awareness and insight to become a credible chemical engineer.Our Chemical Engineering course is founded upon a wide body of respected research, from specific areas of advanced chemical engineering to complex workplace regulations.Your Chemical Engineering research project gives an opportunity to collaborate with expert academic staff specialised in a certain research areas, and may also involve collaboration with industry.
column7: Please visit our website for the Chemical Engineering course fee information.
